Field Label: Record ID

The Sickle Cell Disease Health-Related Stigma Scale (SCD-HRSS) is a 30-item self-administered questionnaire that measures the amount of external stigma experienced by SCD patients (specifically, related to pain).

The Psychosocial and SDoH Working Group recognizes that these instruments were not developed using inclusive language. The WG recognizes that investigators may want to implement the protocols with appropriate language, but caution that changes should not otherwise alter the items.

This scale is designed to be completed with sickle cell disease (SCD) patients who experience pain as a complication of their disease. It was designed in the United States and may require adaptations for use with SCD populations outside of the United States.

Section Header: In the following 10 statements, the word "people" refers to people in general, not members of your family.
Field Label: People believe that someone with sickle cell pain is as mentally and emotionally healthy as the average person.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: People believe that it is mostly the patient's fault when his/her pain does not get better.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: People are sympathetic when they hear about my pain condition.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: People believe that sickle cell is used as an excuse to get pain medication.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: People understand the suffering experienced by someone with chronic pain.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: I feel embarrassed to tell people that I cannot do something because of my pain.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: People think less of someone who is unable to work because of sickle cell.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: People believe that having sickle cell pain is a sign of weakness.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: People think that someone taking prescription pain medication on a regular basis is a "drug addict".
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Field Label: When people hear that someone has sickle cell pain, they think that person is also likely to have mental or emotional problems.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strong Disagree

Section Header: In the following 10 statements, the word "doctor" refers to all of the doctors you have seen for sickle cell pain.
Field Label: Most doctors believe that there is a real physical cause for sickle cell pain.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Doctors think that people with sickle cell exaggerate their pain.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Many doctors think that people with sickle cell pain want more pain medication than is necessary for their physical pain.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Doctors think that sickle cell pain is mostly a mental or emotional problem.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Most doctors think that people with sickle cell use pain medication appropriately.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Most doctors think that people with sickle cell complain about their illness about as much as people with other medical conditions.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Many doctors believe that people with sickle cell could be more physically active if they wanted.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Many doctors think that people with sickle cell are less emotionally stable than people with other medical problems.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Many doctors think that people with sickle cell pain are "drug addicts".
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Most doctors would prefer not to treat people with sickle cell disease.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Section Header: In the following 10 statements, the word "family" refers to the people who are most important and significant to you.
Field Label: My family understands that I have physical pain.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My family thinks I need less pain medication than I take.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My family feels that I exaggerate how much I hurt in order to get out of doing things that I don't want to do.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My family understands that I can use only as much pain medication as is medically necessary.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My family thinks that I could be more physically active if I wanted.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My family thinks that by taking pain medication on a regular basis, I have become a "drug addict".
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My family understands that sickle cell is a real medical condition.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: I feel that my family has less respect for me since I have sickle cell.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My family thinks that sickle cell pain is more of a mental or emotional problem than a physical problem.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My family feels embarrassed to tell people that I have sickle cell.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly Agree | 2, Somewhat Agree | 3, Neutral | 4, Somewhat Disagree | 5, Strongly Disagree

Field Label:
Scoring: Each subscale score is the sum of the 10 items in the subscale scale. Be sure to use recoded items in scoring (Range: 10-50). Items to be reverse coded are marked with an asterisk (*).

The total score is the sum of all four subscale scores (Range: 40-200). Higher total Sickle Cell Disease Health-Related Stigma Scale (SCD-HRSS) total scores or subscale scores indicate higher levels of perceived stigma.
